```{r}
library(XML)
library(rvest)
library(magrittr)
library(ggmap)
library(maps)
```

 >[table 09]('https://ucr.fbi.gov/crime-in-the-u.s/2015/crime-in-the-u.s.-2015/tables/table-9/table_9_offenses_known_to_law_enforcement_by_state_by_university_and_college_2015')
 
```{r}
url <- 'https://ucr.fbi.gov/crime-in-the-u.s/2015/crime-in-the-u.s.-2015/tables/table-9/table-9-state-pieces/table_9_offenses_known_to_law_enforcement_alabama_by_university_and_college_2015.xls'
data <- url %>%
   read_html() %>%
   html_nodes(css="table") %>%
   html_table()
```
